about_the_game:
Superstellar offers a fresh take on the survivor genre with its advanced stat synergies, extensive build diversity and crucial player choice. Roam endless space and engage in frantic combat with responsive, racing-like movement. Complete missions and milestones to unlock new spaceships, each equipped with new weapons and exclusive upgrade choices. Choose your upgrades wisely and fight to stay alive as long as possible against hordes of pesky enemies! Runs typically last about 20 minutes, but skilled players might endure a bit longer.

How long can you survive?

Key features:

  • Endless mode.

  • Randomly generated space environment.

  • 3 enemy territories and a brutal mode that combines them.

  • More than 500 enemies at once.

  • 3 distinct spaceships/classes with their own weapons, status effects and upgrades.

    - Orion class, energy and electricity based with electrocution.

    - Phoenix class, fire based with igniting and burning.

    - Titan class, ice and summoner based with chilling/freezing/shattering.

  • Game-changing ultimate abilities for each class.

  • Light, medium and heavy armored versions of each ship.

  • 75 large build-altering passives.

  • 36 unique weapons with different rarities and effects.

  • 24 player stats with interactions and synergies.

  • Randomized balanced stat upgrade cards each level.

  • In depth statistics systems.

  • Missions.

  • Steam achievements.

  • High score system.

  • Seamless gamepad support.

  • And much more.

name: Superstellar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 3855U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 510
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Build your spaceship and navigate the chaos in this physics-based roguelike ARPG survivor hybrid set in space. With thousands of weapon and stat combinations, every run in Superstellar is different.
